#summary Commands which Twiny supports in full mode.
#labels Commands,Featured,Onenglish,Fullmode

Command    Explanation <br>
*/help* - Shows help by commands <br>
*/quit* - Quitting from programm <br>
*/twit _new status_* - Posting _new status_ to twitter.com <br>
*/info _username_* - Getting info about _username_, if without _username_ getting info about current username <br>
*/dm _username_ _message_* - Sending direct _message_ to _username_<br>
*/follow _username_ * - Following to _username_<br>
